data.title: How To Remove Revco Solutions From Your Report, 2023
data.meta_description: Revco Solutions is likely on your credit report as a "collections" account. Learn how to remove them, today!
data.text:
What Is Revco Solutions On My Credit Report?

Revco Solutions is a debt collection agency. If you are seeing them on your credit report, it likely means they have purchased your debt from a creditor and are (or will be) attempting to collect it from you.

Is Revco Solutions A Debt Collection Agency?

Yes, Revco Solutions is a debt collection agency. They buy debt from a number of different creditors that no longer wish to attempt to collect the amount themselves (also known as a "charge-off").

Revco Solutions may attempt to reach out via mail or phone calls (demanding payment). The worst part is a collections account will now be seen on your credit report. This hurts your score, as well as reducing your chances of getting approved for a loan or other important financial event.

Who Does Revco Solutions Collect For?

Revco Solutions purchases debt from a range of different creditors. The information isnât always publicly available and is constantly changing, so itâs difficult to provide an accurate and up-to-date list.

Does Revco Solutions Hurt My Credit Score?

Yes, it is highly likely having Revco Solutions on your credit report is damaging your score significantly.

How Do I Remove Revco Solutions From My Credit Report?

To be eligible to remove Revco Solutions from your credit report, you typically need to meet the following requirements:

Any information on the account is incorrect

Any information on the account is errorâd

Any information on the account is fraudulent

And is not (or cannot be) fixed in an appropriate amount of time

According to a study by the U.S. PIRGs, 79% of credit reports contain mistakes or serious errors. Going after these types of accounts for our clients is our specialty.

Should I Pay For Delete With Revco Solutions?

Paying off Revco Solutions to have credit bureaus delete it from your report sounds like a good idea. There's one major problem. Paying a debt in collections changes your credit report status from 'unpaid' to 'paid', but the collection remains on your report for 7 years (from the date of first delinquency). This means your credit is still damaged.

Should I Negotiate A Settlement With Revco Solutions?

Settling your debt with Revco Solutions could go both ways. It may help your score, but it may also hurt your score. Many variables impact the end result. There is a better path to a good result. Work with a company that is able to review these accounts for you (like Credit Sage), and if any issues with the account exist you may have it removed all together (and never have to hear from them again).

Is Revco Solutions Legit, Fake Or A Scam?

Revco Solutions is a legitimate company. They arenât fake or trying to scam you. But it is likely they are spam calling you trying to collect a debt. One of the best ways to deal with this is to dispute and remove unvalidated debts.

Why Do Revco Solutions Keep Calling Me?

Revco Solutions continues to call and attempt to collect a debt. The best thing you can do is ignore their calls and speak with a company that can help you get it removed (like Credit Sage).

The best thing you can do to stop this is speak with a company that can help you get them removed from your credit report, like Credit Sage. Revco Solutions Reviews And Complaints

Revco Solutions has terrible BBB reviews. This may come from their repeated calls and letters to consumers trying to collect their debt.

Will Revco Solutions Try Suing Or Garnishing My Wages?

Revco Solutions suing would be a very unlikely situation. In rare cases it may happen, but it certainly isnât the norm. State and federal laws place limits or 'exemptions' that apply to bank and wage garnishments.

Does Revco Solutions Accept A Goodwill Letter To Remove My Collection/Charge-Off?

Based on our years of experience dealing with companies like this, Revco Solutions does not accept goodwill letters to remove collection accounts or charge offs.

What Are My Rights When Dealing With Revco Solutions?

You have the right to dispute any of your debt that Revco Solutions has purchased. Revco Solutions is governed by the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act (or FDCPA) and the Fair Credit Reporting Act (or FCRA). While these acts seem very complicated, they provide a great deal of power to the consumer if you know how to use it properly.

What Is Revco Solutions Phone Number?

You likely want to call Credit Sage before deciding whether or not to call Revco Solutions. The reason? You may not want to pay Revco Solutions debt, especially if it's inaccurate. Paying it off could hurt your score.
